ACL SIGPARSE

Special interest group on natural language parsing

SIGPARSE is the Special Interest Group on Natural Language Parsing of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL). The group consists of about 200 researchers with research interests in various aspects of parsing natural language and computatioinal models of linguistic structure.

SIGPARSE sponsors the International Conference on Parsing Technologies (IWPT). The next IWPT is planned for 2025.

Made with Jekyll with a design by Allan Lab and modified by SIGPARSE.
